closure.deprecationMessage: Closure Compiler feature is splitted. If you want to use, Please download Closure Compiler extension.

altServer.description: alternate servers. It has similar properties with root manifest

createSyncCache.description: Create ftp-kr.cache.json file to save remote modification (default: true)

followLink.description: If it is true, extension will access symlink target or ignore symlink (default: false)

localBasePath.desciption: Set local directory to sync (default: workspace root)

autoDelete.description: Delete FTP file on delete in workspace (default: false)

autoDownload.description: It will check modification of every opening and download if it modified (default: false)

autoDownloadAlways.description: Check server modification at set time intervals and download it. If it is zero, feature is disabled (default: 0)

viewSizeLimit.description: Bytes. File download size limit in ftp tree view (default: 4MiB)

downloadTimeExtraThreshold.description: Milliseconds. To avoid upload just downloaded file (default: 1000)

ignoreJsonUploadCaution.description: ignore caution when ftp-kr.json is uploaded

noticeFileCount.description: Notice with task.json if upload/download file is too many

logLevel.description: Log level setting for debug (default: NORMAL)

ignore.description: Ignore file or directory list. Is NOT glob pattern
